comment.author: 53012263@N00
comment._content: W4IYC - Whiskey Four India Yankee Charlie It should be easy to look this guy up by his call sign, if you call the local Amateur Radio club. Quick google search, no name but, This call sign was registered in 1946 in Bristol, VA in Call Area 4 www.geocities.com/w8jyz/W4.htm

comment.author: 97676798@N00
comment._content: Lester always dressed to the nines and then secluded himself in his radio closet. It was later discovered none of his equipment was plugged in. -- Seen on your photo stream. (?)
